text: The Reese Creek School in Gallatin County, Montana, northeast of Belgrade, Montana, is a one-room schoolhouse which was built in 1906. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1981. It is a balloon-framed one- room schoolhouse building with a recessed entrance and a large cupola. With It is located on Springhill Road.Google satellite view, accessed August 31, 2019. ==References== Category:Schools in Montana Category:One-room schoolhouses Category:National Register of Historic Places in Gallatin County, Montana Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1906 Category:1906 establishments in Montana
title: Reese Creek School
